title: Pixel 3a xl lock screen auto off setting can't be found. I had it yesterday.
content: When the phone is off, I want the screen to turn off until I lift the phone to show the time. It was working yesterday, but suddenly is on all the time. I thought it was under Display>Advanced>Lock screen. But there is no lock screen there. How do I auto turn off this?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a XL
